application.doc: Retrieving an HTTP Transformation Rule file template

param.name: http_transformation_rule_template_identifier
param.doc: Specify to retrieve the request or response template. Valid values are "http_transformation_rules_request_template" and "http_transformation_rules_response_template".

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve an HTTP Transformation Rule file template
method.doc: To retrieve the HTTP Transformation Rule file template with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the HTTP Transformation Rule file resource URI.

request.doc:
Retrieve the request template
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/wga_templates/http_transformation_rules_request_template
Retrieve the response template
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/wga_templates/http_transformation_response_request_template

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: listHttpTransformationRuleJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
